Chuchun is a Super Sparrow ridden by Itomimizu. He and Itomimizu witnessed all the Davy Back Fight games between the Foxy Pirates and the Straw Hat Pirates.

Vice Admiral Comil is the commander of Marine Base G-2. He first appeared in Portgas D. Ace's cover story, and later took part in the Summit War of Marineford.
Chouchou is a dog from Orange Town, famed for his unceasing vigil over the pet-food shop founded by his deceased owner. He is classified as a Type B creature, "Small Friendly".

Azuki is an old woman who lives in Ebisu Town.

Professor Clover was the director of the Ohara Library, and a leading authority on archaeology. He was a professor and scholar who studied poneglyphs with his fellow colleagues in the Tree of Knowledge. During his younger years, he was also an infamous explorer known for getting repeatedly caught by the Marines.

Aisa is a young Shandia girl who used to sneak onto the Upper Yard frequently to collect Vearth. She is Isa's daughter. After the timeskip, she works in the Wagomuland theme park and sells Cloud Balloons.

Beer VI is the king of the Roshwan Kingdom.
Babanuki is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates who serves as the warden of the Prisoner Mine in Udon, a region of Wano Country. After the prison takeover, Babanuki was tamed by Tama.

Akumai was a Billions agent who followed Mr. 2 Bon Kurei everywhere before he was captured by Hina when Mr. 2 and his crew sacrificed themselves to save the Straw Hat Pirates. His current fate is unknown.
Cornelia is a member of the Spade Pirates.

Banchi is a giant "all-terrain" turtle used by Baroque Works—particularly Miss All-Sunday—for transportation. He is classified as a Type A creature, "Big Friendly".
"Catcher-Killing" Babe, better known by his alias Mr. 4, is a former officer agent of the Baroque Works and partner of Miss Merry Christmas. He is also Lassoo's owner.
Bacura is a black panther owned by the Kuja Pirates under Boa Hancock.
Ally is a little girl who was being held captive in the Biscuit Room, on Punk Hazard. She was freed with the rest of the children by the Straw Hat Pirates.

Avalo Pizarro, also known as the "Corrupt King", was one of the criminals who was given a life sentence in Level 6 of Impel Down, as his crimes were so atrocious, he had to effectively be erased from history. Prior to his life of crime, he was once a king of a North Blue kingdom that overthrew him for his despotic ways. He has since been freed by Marshall D. Teach and has become a member of the Blackbeard Pirates.
"Sweeper" Bobbin is a bishop-ranked combatant of the Big Mom Pirates.

Bariete is a monkey mink who is a member of the Recon Squad (偵察隊, Teisatsu-tai?), and the one in charge of guarding the gates of the Mokomo Dukedom.

Ankoro is a gigantic anglerfish formerly under the command of captain Vander Decken IX, residing in the Underworld of the Sea, seven thousand meters underneath the ocean surface. Wadatsumi seems to regard Ankoro as a pet, as apparently Ankoro was told "not to eat ships" before.

Bao Huang is a Shinuchi in the Beasts Pirates, being part of the crew's surveillance division, the "Marys". She appears to have the duty of keeping and presenting daily schedules for the crew and their captain Kaidou.
Barry is a member of the Spade Pirates.

Batchee is a fly that Fullbody put in his soup to try to humiliate Sanji.

Batman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates.

Blondie is an infamous New World pirate who was allied with Whitebeard.

Bellamy the Hyena is the former captain of the Bellamy Pirates, and a former member of the Donquixote Pirates. After the Dressrosa Arc, he retired from piracy and became a dyer.

Aramaki, better known by his alias Ryokugyu, is an admiral in the Marines. He was conscripted through a World Military Draft during the two-year timeskip, being appointed to his rank (next to Fujitora) to fill the two admiral vacancies caused by Kuzan's resignation and Sakazuki's promotion.

Aruyutayan V was the king of Lvneel Kingdom roughly 400 years ago when Mont Blanc Noland discovered Shandora.
Bluejam was the captain of the Bluejam Pirates, and an infamous pirate of the East Blue. He was one of the main antagonists of the Post-War Arc.
Bingo is a former priest and cooper who currently lives in Ebisu Town in Wano Country. He formerly lived in the Flower Capital before losing all his money and being exiled.
Dagama is the tactician of the Prodence Kingdom. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. He is an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc.
Bomba is a member of the Marines G-5 Branch Unit 01. He is a subordinate of Smoker and Tashigi.
Asahija is a Marine Chief Petty Officer whose shadow was once stolen by Gecko Moria.

Shin Jaiya is a citizen of Dressrosa. She is the granddaughter of Shin Detamaruka.

japanese_name: シャーロット・カスタード
description: Charlotte Custard is the sixth daughter and 16th child of the Charlotte Family and the middle triplet sister of Cracker and Angel. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

description: Charlotte Laurin is the 18th son and 29th child of the Charlotte Family and the younger twin brother of Compo. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Bushon is one of the Sea Train organizers in Water 7, along with Stevie.

His previous known bounty amounted to 249,000,000, but after the timeskip, it was raised to 320,000,000. After encountering Kaidou, he joined the Beasts Pirates and became one of the crew's Shinuchi.
Charlotte Gala is the ninth son and the 14th child of the Charlotte Family and the youngest quintuplet brother of Opera, Counter, Cadenza, and Cabaletta.

Despite nominally being the head of the crew besides Ace, Deuce could struggle being respected by the crew, often relying on Skull and Mihar, the other ship's officers. In what became known as the Mountain God Incident, it was cut down by Kozuki Oden during its attack on Flower Capital, but it ultimately survived the ordeal.

Minatomo-san is a carpenter who was created by Oda as a One Piece SBS joke character to explain how the door Higuma kicked off its hinges was suddenly back in place as the bandit left the bar, after Higuma smashed a bottle of sake over Shanks.

He was born 56 years before the present day, but traveled 20 years forward in time when he was 36 years old.
Kechatch is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to the Whitebeard Pirates.

description: Trafalgar Lami was Trafalgar D. Water Law's younger sister from the town of Flevance.

description: Saint Imu of the Nerona Family was one of the twenty kings who founded the World Government after the Void Century 800 years ago. They have been theorized by Emporio Ivankov to be Imu: the current shadowy occupant of the Empty Throne, having prolonged their life to this day presumably through the usage of the Ope Ope no Mi, adding that only one of the twenty founders could command the Five Elders.
Tenjo-Sagari is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates who works under Black Maria.
Yosaku along with Johnny are old friends and former bounty hunting partners of Roronoa Zoro.

"Axe-Hand" Morgan is a former Marine captain, the father of Helmeppo and the first significant Marine officer to appear in the storyline. After his defeat by Monkey D. Luffy and Roronoa Zoro, he was stripped of his rank for his many abuses of power.
Yamenahare is a citizen of Pucci and the manservant to Marumieta, the daughter of Pucci's mayor, Bimine.
Wheel is the prince of South Fire Kingdom. He accompanied his father Jeep to the Levely.

King Neptune is a coelacanth merman and the king of the Ryugu Kingdom on Fish-Man Island. He is also the current patriarch of the Neptune Family, father of Fukaboshi, Ryuboshi, Manboshi, and Shirahoshi, and the husband of the late Queen Otohime.

Yamato is the son of Kaidou. Born as Kaidou's daughter and groomed from a young age to be his heir, Yamato instead developed a profound admiration for the legendary samurai Kozuki Oden. After Oden's death, Yamato decided to become like him, impersonating him and adopting his mannerisms. As a result of this desire to emulate Oden, Yamato decided to become a man and identify as Kaidou's son, which is why his father and Beasts Pirates refer to him as such as well.

Dr. Tsukimi was an old man who appeared in Enel's cover story.
Yotsubane is one of the Shandia warriors who fought against Enel.
"Big News" Morgans is the president of the World Economy News Paper and one of the emperors of the Underworld.

Rindo is a member of the Kuja Pirates.

Sage Gode is one of the three Birkan clergymen who lived on Skypiea and served Enel.
Goki is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number "five".

description: Vinsmoke Sora was the queen of the Germa Kingdom. She was the wife of Vinsmoke Judge, and the mother of Reiju, Ichiji, Niji, Sanji, and Yonji. She died sometime during Sanji's childhood.

japanese_name: ネフェルタリ・ティティ
description: Nefertari Titi was the queen of Arabasta, Nefertari Cobra's wife, and Nefertari Vivi's mother.

japanese_name: ネフェルタリ・コブラ
description: Nefertari Cobra was the 12th king of the Arabasta Kingdom, the former patriarch of Nefertari Family, husband of the late Nefertari Titi and father of Nefertari Vivi. He was a descendant of Nefertari D. Lili, one of the First Twenty monarchs who founded the World Government, and secretly bore her initial D. in his name.
Noriko is a nori maker who lives in Ebisu Town.

Trebol is one of the top three officers of the Donquixote Pirates, acting as a Staff Officer. He occupies the Club seat of the Donquixote Family and is the leader of the crew's Trebol Army subdivision.

Richie is Mohji's pet lion and a member of the Buggy and Alvida Alliance as part of Buggy Pirates. He was a member of Buggy's Delivery, and is currently a member of Cross Guild. He is classified as a Type C creature, "Big Savage".
Kikipatsu is a member of the Blackbeard Pirates.
Peachbeard is the epithet of the captain of the Peachbeard Pirates, who are subordinates of the Emperor Blackbeard.
Negikuma Maria is the big woman who spoke to Dalton while the Straw Hat Pirates were in Bighorn.
Kiev is a member of the Franky Family.
Kotetsu was a swordsmith who crafted the cursed Great Grade sword Nidai Kitetsu. He is an ancestor of the present-day Kozuki Family in Wano Country, namely Sukiyaki, Oden, Momonosuke, and Hiyori.
Take is a carp Fish-Man and is a member of the Arlong Pirates. He is the commander of parties.

Ochoku is a former member of the Rocks Pirates and one of the participants of the Rocky Port Incident. They were also the previous ruler of Hachinosu, before Blackbeard took over and became the island's current ruler.

Tabuhachiro is an samurai and an ally of the Kozuki Family. After waiting 20 years for the return of the Nine Red Scabbards, he affiliated with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance to raid Onigashima.
Koby the Hero is a Marine Captain who trained together with Helmeppo under Vice Admiral Garp's supervision. He is currently a member of the Marine special forces unit SWORD.
Quincy is a member of the Kid Pirates.
Commander Ripper was one of Morgan's officers at his base in the East Blue. After Morgan's defeat, he takes control of the base's operations.

He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. After the final battle against Donquixote Doflamingo, Orlumbus pledged his loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy and became a pirate.
N/A

The Pacifista are human weapons (人間兵器, ningen-heiki?) developed by Marine head scientist, Dr. Vegapunk. They are cybernetic clones of the former Warlord Bartholomew Kuma, who was the cyborg prototype for the project. As stated by Sentomaru, the funds required for the construction of just one Pacifista are roughly equal to that of a Marine-issued battleship.
Mukkashimi Tower is a spectator at the Corrida Colosseum.
Tamachibi is a child Dr. Kureha healed while she was in Cocoa Weed. He lives with his father, who is the owner of Stool, a restaurant in town.
Duke Hitsugisukan is a sheep mink and the former ruler of the Mokomo Dukedom before Inuarashi and Nekomamushi.
N/A

description: Vinsmoke Niji, also known as "Dengeki Blue", is the second son and third child of the Vinsmoke Family. He is a prince of the Germa Kingdom and a commander in its military arm, Germa 66.
Rangram was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom; Tontatta Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet
description: "Warrior" Leo is a dwarf from the Tontatta Kingdom and the leader of the "Tonta Corps " (トンタ兵長, Tonta-heichō?), which was later reformed as a pirate crew now known as the Tontatta Pirates, with Leo now acting as the captain. He is the captain of the fifth ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.

Tilestone is one of the five foremen of Dock One of the Galley-La Company in Water 7. Tilestone is the last of the foremen to be formally introduced in the story, although he is present from the first scene Galley-La is shown in. His specialties are cabinetry, caulking, and flag making.
Poppy is a member of the Kuja tribe.
Hamburg is a combatant of the Foxy Pirates and also the leader of the Groggy Monsters. Along with Porche, he was one of Foxy's first crewmates.
Poppoko is a member of the Alvida Pirates and the younger triplet brother of Heppoko and Peppoko.
Ramba is an infamous New World pirate captain who allied with Whitebeard.
Warashi is one of the Shandia warriors who fought against Enel.
N/A

Shimotsuki Ushimaru was a member of the Shimotsuki Family, and the last daimyo of Ringo in Wano Country. He ruled until the takeover of Kurozumi Orochi as shogun 20 years ago. He was a direct descendant of the legendary samurai Shimotsuki Ryuma, the younger brother of Shimotsuki Furiko, and the great-uncle of Roronoa Zoro.
Reuder is a reporter who witnessed and reported on the events of the Summit War of Marineford from Sabaody Archipelago.
Domino is the Head Jailer of Impel Down serving under Warden Hannyabal.
"Executioner" Roshio was a pirate captain who had a bounty of 42,000,000. He was killed by Bellamy at the beginning of the Jaya Arc.
Ross is a former combatant of the Bellamy Pirates.
Pearl the Iron Wall is the commander of the Krieg Pirates' second unit. Due to his actions, he can be considered the tertiary antagonist of the Baratie Arc.

affiliations: Arabasta Kingdom; Nefertari Family; World Government
description: Nefertari D. Lili was the queen of the Arabasta Kingdom during the time of the Void Century, being one of the twenty monarchs credited with the founding of the World Government. Unlike the other nineteen monarchs, Lili chose not to become a World Noble and move to Mary Geoise, but before she could return to her home country, she mysteriously vanished. Aside from that, little is known about her except that she had a younger brother who succeeded her as ruler of Arabasta.
Snake-Eyes Yatappe is a yakuza boss who was in charge of the Kibi region in Wano Country. He was imprisoned in Udon by the Beasts Pirates, but was freed when Luffy took over the prison.

Mr. Motzel is a gourmand and one of the known customers of the Baratie.
Yuki was the little ranch girl who lived on a remote island on a ranch where the giants celebrated. She was responsible for starting the duel between Dorry and Brogy.
Robson is Wapol's pet, and personal transport. He is a White Walkie, also known as "Wooly Hippo".
"Brutal Bull" Ucy is a fighting bull (闘牛, Tōgyū?) that regularly competed as a gladiator in Dressrosa's Corrida Colosseum, where he was befriended (and named) by Monkey D. Luffy.
Tritobu is the prince of Nagagutsu Kingdom. He accompanied his father Furrari to the Levely.
N/A
Nico Olvia was the mother of Nico Robin The older sister of Oran and paternal aunt of Mizuira,, and an archaeologist from Ohara who studied the Poneglyphs two decades ago.
Taro was a member of the Roger Pirates.
Zodia is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to Whitebeard.

Ryunosuke was a "Rising Dragon" (昇り竜, Nobori Ryū?) created by Kurozumi Kanjuro using the power of the Fude Fude no Mi. It was created to aid Kurozumi Kanjuro, Kin'emon, Trafalgar Law, and the Straw Hat Pirates in scaling the leg of Zunesha to reach Zou, and received its name from the Straw Hats.

description: The Risky Brothers are two male pirates working as members of the Rolling Pirates under their captain, Lola. They were members of the Thriller Bark Victim's Association, a group of Gecko Moria's victims who banded together. During the time their shadows were stolen from them, they were placed in two squirrel zombies who were also named the Risky Brothers.
Ratel is a Marine captain who led an invasion of Sphinx during Marco's absence.

japanese_name: シーガル・ガンズ・ノズドン
description: Seagull Guns Nozdon is a former member of the Roger Pirates.

description: Gol D. Roger, more commonly known as Gold Roger, was a legendary pirate who, as captain of the Roger Pirates, held the title of Pirate King and owned the legendary treasure known as One Piece. He was also the lover of Portgas D. Rouge and the biological father of Portgas D. Ace.

affiliations: Golden Lion Pirates; Rocks Pirates (former); Impel Down (former)
description: Shiki the Golden Lion, also known as the "Flying Pirate", is the admiral and helmsman of the Golden Lion Pirates, the first known prisoner ever to escape from Impel Down and a former member of the Rocks Pirates.

Sapoten Graveyard, also known as Cactus Rock (サボテン岩, saboten iwa?, English versions: Cactus Rocks) is a graveyard located on Whisky Peak. The large, cactus-like appearance of Sapoten Graveyard makes it a notable landmark of Cactus Island.
Dotaku is a samurai who resides in Wano Country.

Toko is a girl who lives in the Flower Capital of Wano Country and is under the care of Kozuki Hiyori. She is the adopted daughter of the late former daimyo of Hakumai, Shimotsuki Yasuie, and thus a member of the Shimotsuki Family. She worked as a kamuro for Hiyori, who was living as the courtesan "Komurasaki", until Toko angered Shogun Kurozumi Orochi and was driven out of the Flower Capital. After the Beasts Pirates' fall from power and Orochi's death, she returned to live in the Flower Capital with Hiyori.
Ossamondo is a member of the Spade Pirates.
Chess is a former minister of defense serving under Wapol. After the attack of Blackbeard, he became a pirate alongside his king, until their subsequent return to Drum Island.
N/A
Kotatsu is a member of the Spade Pirates.

Kong is the World Government Commander-in-Chief. He was the previous Fleet Admiral of the Marines at the time of the Battle in Edd War twenty-seven years ago. Some time after Gol D. Roger's execution twenty-four years ago, he was promoted while Sengoku succeeded him as Fleet Admiral.

Monstrous Bird Pinky is a giant bird that appeared in the Orange Town Arc. He is classified as a Type C creature, "Big Savage".

He is one of the founders of Cross Guild, and was formerly one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea (being the first revealed and formally introduced) until the group's dissolution.

description: Rocks D. Xebec, commonly known simply as Rocks, was the captain of the Rocks Pirates. He was a prominent figure 40 years ago, before the Pirate King Gol D. Roger came into power. He was ultimately defeated by an alliance formed by Monkey D. Garp and Roger, earning Garp the nickname "Hero of the Marines".
Takao, also known as O-Taka (お高?), is a kamuro living in the Flower Capital of Wano Country who attended to the oiran Komurasaki alongside Toko.

Tom was a long-horned cowfish fish-man who was known as the most skilled shipwright in the world and the head of his own company, Tom's Workers. He was also Iceburg's and Franky's teacher and Den's older brother. Furthermore, he was well known for being the builder of the Roger Pirates' ship, the Oro Jackson.
Tyrannosaurus is the name of a small mouse that Iceburg found and takes care of.
Zepo was a polar bear mink who was Bepo's older brother and a member of the Nox Pirates. He was killed by Big Mom in Totto Land five years ago after he spun her Soul Pocus roulette wheel.
Uwattsura is a Waiter of the Beasts Pirates who serves as a chief guard in the Prisoner Mine of the Udon region.
Raki is one of the Shandia warriors that fought to take back Upper Yard from Enel.

Minatomo is a legendary carpenter in Wano Country and the leader of a guild that Franky joined to get access to the blueprints of Kaidou's fortress. He is related to another person, whose name is also Minatomo, who is a descendant of someone who traveled from Wano to East Blue.
Reck is a member of the Kid Pirates.
Salome is Boa Hancock’s personal Snake Weapon.
N/A

description: Shimotsuki Ryuma was a legendary, world-famous samurai hailing from the Shimotsuki Family of Wano Country, who lived during Wano's "Country of Gold" era centuries ago. He was revered for his mastery of swordsmanship that earned him the title Sword God, as well as his feat of slaying a dragon. He is also the direct ancestor of Shimotsuki Ushimaru and Roronoa Zoro.

description: Rolling Logan is an army commander of the Majiatsuka Kingdom. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.
Nitro is a jelly homie that is often seen with Charlotte Pudding.
The Recycle-Wan is a mechanical dog-like creature that eats scraps and litter on Egghead.
Dorry the Blue Ogre is a giant from Elbaf and one of the two captains of the Giant Warrior Pirates alongside Brogy. He was an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Little Garden Arc.
Giro Chintaro is a samurai from Wano Country who was appointed as the kaishakunin for Zorojuro's seppuku ritual.

Samurai Batts is a visitor on Kyuka Island.
"Demon Bamboo" Vergo was one of the four elite officers and the first to occupy the Heart seat of the Donquixote Pirates under the codename Corazon.

"Ship Cutter" T Bone was a Marine Vice Admiral. As a Marine Captain two years ago, he was a minor antagonist during the Water 7 Arc and confronted the Straw Hat Pirates on the Sea Train route to Enies Lobby. Prior to joining the Marines, he was a royal knight.

description: Saint Shepherd Ju Peter is one of the Five Elders, the public heads of the World Government, and holds the title Warrior God of Agriculture.
Prince Grus is a Marine Rear Admiral stationed at Marine Base G-14 and a member of SWORD. His fellow SWORD members also refer to Grus by the title of Prince (王子, Ōji?) which differs from his surname.
Petermoo was a member of the Roger Pirates.
Onimaru is a komagitsune who was once the companion of the late daimyo of Ringo, Shimotsuki Ushimaru.

description: Momoo is a giant sea cow from the Grand Line, and the first Sea Beast seen in the series. He is classified as a Type A creature, "Big Friendly".
The Risky Brothers were a duo of Wild Zombie squirrels that served under Perona. They were animated from the shadows of two pirates by the same name.
UK is a member of the Kid Pirates.

Zunesha is a Naitamie-Norida elephant that was affiliated with Joy Boy 800 years ago. It now wanders through the New World and carries the island of Zou on its back as punishment for an unspecified crime it committed in the past.

description: Vinsmoke Reiju, also known as "Poison Pink", is the eldest child and only daughter of the Vinsmoke Family. She is the princess of the Germa Kingdom and a commander in its military army, Germa 66. She is the older sister of Sanji and an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates in the Whole Cake Island Arc.
Wanyudo is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates, serving as Black Maria's weapon.
Patty is one of the main cooks at the Baratie, currently serving as the restaurant's head pâtissier.
Rockstar is a member of the Red Hair Pirates, being relatively new in the crew two years ago.

Prometheus the Sun is a sun homie that Big Mom summons from her right hand. He is a special kind of homie, as he received a soul fragment from Big Mom herself, and serves as one of her personal weapons alongside Napoleon and Hera, and formerly Zeus.
Yasopp, known as "Chaser", is one of the Senior Officers and the sniper of the Red Hair Pirates. He is also the father of Usopp and the widower of Banchina.
Saint Pluming is a World Noble.

description: Seto was one of the Shandia who lived on Jaya four hundred years ago.
Senor Pink is an assassin and officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Diamante Army. He was also the husband of Russian and the father of Gimlet.
Thatch was the 4th division commander as well as the culinary chef of the Whitebeard Pirates. He was murdered by Marshall D. Teach prior to the main storyline.
N/A
Octopako is an octopus fish-woman whom Hatchan tried to win over during his cover story, Hatchan's Sea-Floor Stroll.

affiliations: Beasts Pirates; Orochi Oniwabanshu (former); Kurozumi Family (former)
description: Raijin is a ninja and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.

affiliations: Shakky's Rip-off Bar; Kuja; Kuja Pirates (former)
description: Shakuyaku, most commonly known by her nickname Shakky, is the bartender of Shakky's Rip-off Bar on the Sabaody Archipelago, where she lives with her romantic partner Silvers Rayleigh. She is a minor ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Sabaody Archipelago Arc.

japanese_name: パンクータ・ダケヤン
description: Pankuta Dakeyan is a prisoner in Impel Down.

affiliations: Straw Hat Grand Fleet (New Giant Warrior Pirates), Buggy's Delivery (former)
description: Road is a giant from Elbaf who is the navigator of the New Giant Warrior Pirates and was formerly an S-Class ranked mercenary for Buggy's Delivery.

Shimotsuki Kozaburo was a member of the Shimotsuki Family and a swordsmith who crafted the Great Grade Blades, Wado Ichimonji and Enma. He was born in Wano Country, but illegally departed from there 55 years ago and eventually settled down in what became Shimotsuki Village in the East Blue. There, he fathered a son named Koushirou, making him the grandfather of Koushirou's deceased daughter Kuina.
N/A

The Minister of the Left is a catfish merman in service of King Neptune. While it is not clear what his job entails, it appears to involve some sort of administrative and military duties. His actual name is currently unknown.

affiliations: Mokomo Dukedom; Guardians; Kozuki Family; Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance (disbanded); Nine Red Scabbards; Roger Pirates (former); Whitebeard Pirates (former)
description: Master Nekomamushi is a feline mink and the guardian of the Whale Forest on Zou, dubbed the "Ruler of Night" as he formerly ruled over the Mokomo Dukedom from 6:00 PM to 6:00 AM. He and Inuarashi serve as retainers for the Kozuki Family of Wano Country, as members of the Nine Red Scabbards.
Mummy Mee is one of the houseparents, alongside Daddy Dee, of a World Government-affiliated orphanage situated on the Conomi Islands.

Monet was a scout and assistant for Caesar Clown and his underlings in the research facility on Punk Hazard. She had her original human arms and legs replaced with bird limbs, giving her an appearance resembling a harpy. She was, in truth, a member and officer of the Donquixote Pirates and was sent as a deep cover agent by Doflamingo.

japanese_name: シャーロット・スムージー
description: Charlotte Smoothie is the 14th daughter and 35th child of the Charlotte Family, the older triplet sister of Citron and Cinnamon, and a longleg-human hybrid. She serves as one of the Three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates and as Totto Land's Minister of Juice (ジュース大臣, Jūsu Daijin?), governing over 100% Island.
Rika is a young girl from Shells Town, and the daughter of Ririka. She currently serves as a waitress at the 153rd Marine Branch.
Rint was one of the archaeologists of Ohara.
Shelly is Tonjit's hooooorse and an animal of Long Ring Long Land.
Lemoncheese is the queen of Bestland Kingdom (ベストランド王国, Besutorando Ōkoku?) and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.

japanese_name: シャーロット・ユーエン
description: Charlotte Yuen is the 35th son and 64th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He was a member of Charlotte Oven's army to ambush Monkey D. Luffy on Cacao Island.
Tera was the daughter of a bandit from the East Blue. She is the mother of Roronoa Zoro as well as the wife of Roronoa Arashi.
Yokozuna is a Sumo Frog that Tom's Workers kept as a pet, friend and mascot up until Tom's execution.
Mummy is a sorcerer who joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.
The Seaboar is a sea creature that debuted in Hatchan's Sea-Floor Stroll.
Saint Rosward is one of the World Nobles who reside in the Holy City of Mary Geoise. He is the father of Shalria and Charlos.
Mornin is the mayor of Syrup Village, and one of several villagers who used Usopp's antics as a makeshift alarm clock.
Samosa is a king and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.

japanese_name: シャーロット・ズコット

Two years later, he was given his own kingdom by the World Nobles and now reigns as the king of the Black Drum Kingdom. After witnessing Nefertari Cobra being assassinated by Imu and the Five Elders at the latest Levely, Wapol became a fugitive when he fled and took refuge with Morgans in his news balloon along with Vivi.
